name: Tailscale VPN (Safe Defaults)
author: joshuajosephherbert@gmail.com
description: Runs a Tailscale VPN connection inside the container using userspace networking. Uses safe defaults (no tags/SSH by default) to avoid common ACL and container key issues. Clones install/start scripts from your GitHub repo.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

# Update package lists and upgrade installed packages
apt update && apt upgrade -y

# Install required packages
apt install -y git ca-certificates curl

cd /mnt/server

# Pull scripts from GitHub into the container's server directory
git clone https://github.com/tarboox45-cpu/Tailscale.git .

# Make all shell scripts executable
chmod +x ./*.sh

echo "âœ… Tailscale scripts are ready."

variables.name: Tailscale Auth Key
variables.description: Authentication key from your Tailscale admin panel. MUST be an Auth Key that starts with tskey-auth- (not an API key).

variables.name: Tailscale Hostname
variables.description: Device name that will appear in your Tailnet.

variables.name: Enable Tailscale SSH
variables.description: Enable Tailscale SSH on this node. Recommended: false in containers unless you manage SSH host keys properly.

variables.name: Advertise Exit Node
variables.description: Advertise this node as an exit node (requires approval in Tailscale Admin for the device).

variables.name: Advertise Tags
variables.description: Optional tags (example: tag:container). Leave EMPTY to avoid ACL tagOwners errors.

variables.name: SOCKS5 Server Address
variables.description: SOCKS5 proxy address exposed by tailscaled in userspace mode.

variables.name: Tailscale Version
variables.description: Tailscale static version to download (leave default unless needed).
